info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:12PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Eddy County through 200 PM MDT... At 111 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Whites City, or 18 miles south of Carlsbad, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carlsbad, Loving, Malaga, Whites City, Otis and Cavern City Air Terminal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
